fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Blast a player with flames, attacking them.
- Create a ring of fire around a target, roleblocking and attacking anyone who visits them. (2 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Players you kill are incinerated, hiding their role and will from the public. You will learn what their role is, but not their will. The effect is permanent.
